snippet.title: Arcade Game: Gotcha (1973 Atari) [Re-Uploaded]
snippet.description:
Probably one of the first maze games. Not much to do here. I'm playing on keyboards as there's no CPU controlled movements here. Atari has released a color version of this game. It may have been the first color video game of any kind. This is the only version that's emulated right now. This is game is also emulated on Dice

You can download the latest version of the emulator (Dice 0,2):
http://sourceforge.net/projects/dice/

Note: I edited part of the video to fit within the 10 min.

Recorder: Fraps.
Emulator: Dice 0.2
Encoder: AviSynth+MeGui.

Info: Re-Uploaded for not only better video quality but also for the correct original aspect ratio.
